From the Blog

Blog — Guitar Tips & Song Tutorials

August 2024

Calling All Swifties

Have you always wanted to learn how to sing, play the guitar, or the ukulele using your favorite Taylor Swift songs? Learn from Brooke — she's been teaching Taylor's discography since the Fearless era.
May 2015

Little Fingers and Music Lessons

When should your child start music lessons? Brooke shares advice on ideal starting ages for guitar, ukulele, and voice — and how to nurture your little one's love of music in the meantime.
Brooke's Lessons

Private online guitar, voice, and ukulele lessons for all ages. Based in the DFW metroplex, teaching students everywhere online.
